SEARCH
Package fr.diginamic.entities

Class Sport

java.lang.Object
fr.diginamic.entities.Sport
@Entity public class Sport extends Object
Represents a Sport in the system. A Sport can have multiple wordings (names) depending on the language. Links to WordingSport.
See Also:
  • WordingSport
  • Event
